bibl.title: Rechtsprobleme in neueren papyrologischen Arbeiten.
bibl.note: À propos de: 1. Nico KRUIT, The Meaning of Various Words Related to Wine. Some New Interpretations, ZPE 90 (1992) pp. 265-276; - 2. O. Cambr. Fitzw. Mus. Inv. GR. P.451 [ed.: John C. SHELTON, More Ostraca from the Fitzwilliam Museum, ZPE 86 (1991) pp. 269-270]; - 3. C. Ptol. Sklav. 15 (= P. Cairo Zenon III, 59369); - 4. P. Flor. III, 318 + P. Lond.
